snippet: Roissy-Charles de Gaulle Airport has organized an exhibition in the heart of a terminal, a six-month show called "The Wings of Glory" set up in collaboration with the Musée Rodin. Rotating shows displaying pieces from other French artistic...
abstract: Roissy-Charles de Gaulle Airport has organized an exhibition in the heart of a terminal, a six-month show called "The Wings of Glory" set up in collaboration with the Musée Rodin. Rotating shows displaying pieces from other French artistic institutions will follow.
